document.full_text: the united states men's national soccer team has numerous versatile players on it roster, but perhaps too few specialists. this trend toward flexibility over targeted expertise has become more pronounced in recent weeks.
document.title: versatility vs. specialization: an american dilemma
lines_and_colors: the united states men's national soccer team has numerous versatile players on it roster, but perhaps too few specialists. this trend toward flexibility over targeted expertise has become more pronounced in recent weeks.
